item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (42 points | 4 comments)
2. Ioccc Flight Simulator (2010) (25 points | 3 comments)
3. Scientists Started to Decode Birdsong (22 points | 7 comments)

7. A step toward fully 3D-printed active electronics (136 points | 52 comments)
8. Show HN: HN Update – Hourly news broadcast of top HN stories (471 points | 154 comments)
9. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring FS Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
10. WebGPU-Based WiFi Simulator (280 points | 74 comments)
11. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (270 points | 67 comments)
12. Drasi: Microsoft's open source data processing platform for event-driven systems (280 points | 49 comments)
13. Do AI detectors work? Students face false cheating accusations (227 points | 511 comments)
14. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (7 points | discuss)

21. The AI Investment Boom (231 points | 289 comments)

23. Microsoft said it lost weeks of security logs for its customers' cloud products (211 points | 91 comments)
24. The history of the barcode (69 points | 22 comments)
25. Janus: Decoupling Visual Encoding for Multimodal Understanding and Generation (15 points | 2 comments)
26. Internet Archive breached again through stolen access tokens (448 points | 288 comments)
27. VersaTiles – a complete FLOSS map stack (151 points | 17 comments)
28. Skeptical of rewriting JavaScript tools in "faster" languages (123 points | 210 comments)
29. Memory safety without lifetime parameters (89 points | 30 comments)
30. Introduction to Zig (a project-based book) (17 points | 3 comments)
